name: Linh Anh Nguyen
content: Linh Anh Nguyen's Homepage Linh Anh Nguyen Institute of Informatics University of Warsaw nguyen@mimuw.edu.pl (+48) 22 55-44-440 About Me Associate Professor, Institute of Informatics, University of Warsaw. Education: M.Sc. 1997, Ph.D. 2000, Dr.Sc. 2009, all in Computer Science and from the University of Warsaw. Citizenships: Vietnamese and Polish. Publications DBLP Entry MIMUW Entry List Sorted by Areas Theses Softwares TGC2: Tableaux with Global Caching - a Reasoner for Modal and Description Logics TGC 1.2 : An Efficient Tableau Prover using Global Caching for the Description Logic ALC MProlog : A Modal Logic Programming System Last updated: September 28, 2023
